platform.util

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.util.Vector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents an immutable 2D floating-point vector.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
